REALDOCS:
Welcome to the RealDocs Bot!
I can help you do a Quick Check of your property. %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
QUICK CHECK: Great! Click the following button to get started. %[Get Started](postback:get_started)
GET STARTED: What is the status of this property? %[Ready to Occupy](postback:ready_to_occupy) %[Under Construction](postback:under_construction) %[Construction not Started](postback:not_started)
READY TO OCCUPY: How many floors does this unit have? %[Greater than 3](postback:greater_than_3) %[Less than or equal to 3](postback:less_than_3)
UNDER CONSTRUCTION: How many floors does this unit have? %[Greater than 3](postback:greater_than_3) %[Less than or equal to 3](postback:less_than_3)
CONSTRUCTION NOT STARTED: How many floors does this unit have? %[Greater than 3](postback:greater_than_3) %[Less than or equal to 3](postback:less_than_3)
GREATER THAN 3: Is there a commencement certificate? %[There is a Commencement Certificate](postback:cc_yes) %[There is no Commencement Certificate](postback:cc_no)
LESS THAN OR EQUAL TO 3: Is there a sanctioned building plan? %[There is a sanctioned building plan](postback:sbp_yes) %[There is no sanctioned building plan](postback:sbp_no) %[The sanctioned building plan is in progress](postback:sbp_inprogress)
THERE IS A COMMENCEMENT CERTIFICATE: Is there a sanctioned building plan? %[There is a sanctioned building plan](postback:sbp_yes) %[There is no sanctioned building plan](postback:sbp_no) %[The sanctioned building plan is in progress](postback:sbp_inprogress)
THERE IS NO COMMENCEMENT CERTIFICATE:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
THERE IS A SANCTIONED BUILDING PLAN: Is the floor and tower of the apartment you are considering listed on the Sanctioned Building Plan? %[Yes it is](postback:yes_sbp) %[No it is not](postback:no_sbp)
THERE IS NO SANCTIONED BUILDING PLAN:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
THE SANCTIONED BUILDING PLAN IS IN PROGR:
We recommend you wait till the documents are available.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
YES IT IS: The property is safe to consider. Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
NO IT IS NOT:
This is an illegal construction. We recommend not considering this property.
Would you like to check another property? %[Quick Check](postback:quick_check)
